DataElement.preferredName: Patient Reproduction Pregnancy Breast Feeding Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions that prevent a person from being allowed to participate in a clinical study that address reproduction, pregnancy, and breast feeding as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Reproduction Pregnancy Breast Feeding Exclusion Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the reproduction, ability to generate  offspring, pregnancy, state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), or breast feeding status of a patient or participant as a medical and/or social characteristic that prevents a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Reproduction Pregnancy Breast Feeding Exclusion Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Reproduction is the creation of one thing as a copy of, product of, or replacement for a similar thing.  It is commonly used in the context of biological reproduction and sex. (from Wikipedia):The condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body, after union of an ovum and spermatozoon. (Dorland, 27th ed):The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.:Exclusion; the act of restricting entrance or barring from participation.

Concepts.definition: The generation of offspring by living organisms.
The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.
The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.
Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient pregnant or breast
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breast-feeding, or planning to become pregnant during study treatment and through 3 months after the last dose of talimogene laherparepvec?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnancy or breastfeeding, or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the pre-screening or screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding, or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the pre-screening or screening visit through 120 days after the last dose of trial treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient lactating/breast feeding, or planning to breastfeed while on study through 1 week after the last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breast-feeding, or planning to become pregnant during study treatment and through 7 months after the last dose of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breast-feeding, or planning to become pregnant during study treatment and through 4 months after the last dose of talimogene laherparepvec?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding during study treatment and for 6 months after last dose of study drugs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or actively breastfeeding?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding or expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the trial, starting with the screening visit through 180 days after the last dose of trial treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding (breastfeeding should be discontinued for at least 6 months after last dose of study drug)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is female of childbearing potential, is patient breastfeeding or planning to be pregnant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is female of childbearing potential, patient is not breastfeeding or planning to be pregnant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding or is expecting to conceive or father children within the projected duration of the study, starting with the screening visit through 5 months after the last dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding and will not refrain from nursing throughout the treatment period and for 1 month following the last dose of the study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient pregnant or breastfeeding, or intends to become pregnant during the study or within 3 months after the final dose of mosunetuzumab, 3 months after the final dose of polatuzumab vedotin, and 1 month after the final dose of lenalidomide?
